workflow.name: Create Monday.com board items from Jotform submissions with field mapping
workflow.description:
Capture new Jotform submissions and instantly create items on a Monday.com board with mapped columns (email, date, dropdowns, instructions, etc.).

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup ‚Äî Jotform (simple)
1. **Add your Jotform API key** (Jotform Account ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí API ‚Üí Create Key).  
2. **Create your form template** in Jotform (use fields like Name, Email, Start Date, Engagement Type, Campaign Type, Instructions).  
3. In **n8n**, open the **Jotform Trigger** node and **choose your Jotform template/form** from the dropdown. That‚Äôs it.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup ‚Äî Monday.com
1. In Monday.com, **generate an API token** (Admin/Developers ‚Üí API).  
2. In **n8n ‚Üí Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí Monday.com**, paste your **API token**.  
3. Identify and set:
   - **Board ID** (from your board URL or via node ‚ÄúList‚Äù operations)  
   - **Group ID** (e.g., `topics`)  
   - **Column IDs** that match your board (examples used by this workflow):  
     - `text_mkvdj8v3` ‚Üí Email (Text)  
     - `date_mkvdg4aa` ‚Üí Start Date (Date)  
     - `dropdown_mkvdjwra` ‚Üí Engagement Type (Dropdown)  
     - `dropdown_mkvdd9v3` ‚Üí Campaign Type (Dropdown)  
     - `text_mkvd2md9` ‚Üí Campaign Type (as Text label)  
     - `text_mkvd1bj2` ‚Üí Instructions (Text)  
     - `text_mkvd5w3y` ‚Üí Domain (Text)  
4. Update the **label ‚Üí ID mappings** inside the Monday.com node if your dropdown IDs differ (e.g., `Engagement A` ‚Üí `1`, `Engagement B` ‚Üí `2`).

---

## ‚úÖ Notes (best practices)
- No secrets in nodes: store tokens in **n8n Credentials**.  
- Use the included **Sticky Notes** for quick reference inside the workflow.  
- Test once in Jotform to see the payload flow into Monday.

---

## üì¨ Contact  
Need help customizing this (e.g., extra fields, file uploads, or routing by campaign)?  

- üìß **rbreen@ynteractive.com**  
- üîó **Robert Breen** ‚Äî https://www.linkedin.com/in/robert-breen-29429625/  
- üåê **ynteractive.com** ‚Äî https://ynteractive.com

parameters.content:
### Add Jotform submissions to a Monday.com board (Jotform Trigger ‚Üí Monday.com Create Item)

Capture new Jotform submissions and instantly create items on a Monday.com board with mapped columns (email, dates, dropdowns, instructions, etc.). Great for routing **leads**, **requests**, or **intake forms** straight into your team‚Äôs Monday pipeline.

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup ‚Äî Monday.com
1. In Monday.com, **generate an API token** (Admin/Developers ‚Üí API).  
2. In **n8n ‚Üí Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí Monday.com**, paste your **API token**.  
3. Identify and set:
   - **Board ID** (from your board URL or via node ‚ÄúList‚Äù operations)  
   - **Group ID** (e.g., `topics`)  
   - **Column IDs** that match your board (examples used by this workflow):  
     - `text_mkvdj8v3` ‚Üí Email (Text)  
     - `date_mkvdg4aa` ‚Üí Start Date (Date)  
     - `dropdown_mkvdjwra` ‚Üí Engagement Type (Dropdown)  
     - `dropdown_mkvdd9v3` ‚Üí Campaign Type (Dropdown)  
     - `text_mkvd2md9` ‚Üí Campaign Type (as Text label)  
     - `text_mkvd1bj2` ‚Üí Instructions (Text)  
     - `text_mkvd5w3y` ‚Üí Domain (Text)  
4. Update the **label ‚Üí ID mappings** inside the Monday.com node if your dropdown IDs differ (e.g., `Engagement A` ‚Üí `1`, `Engagement B` ‚Üí `2`).

---
## üì¨ Contact  
Need help customizing this (e.g., more fields, file uploads, or multi-board routing)?  

- üìß **rbreen@ynteractive.com**  
- üîó **Robert Breen** ‚Äî https://www.linkedin.com/in/robert-breen-29429625/  
- üåê **ynteractive.com** ‚Äî https://ynteractive.com

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup ‚Äî Jotform (simple)
1. **Add your Jotform API key** (Jotform Account ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí API ‚Üí Create Key).  
2. **Create your form template** in Jotform (use fields like Name, Email, Start Date, Engagement Type, Campaign Type, Instructions).  
3. In **n8n**, open the **Jotform Trigger** node and **choose your Jotform template/form** from the dropdown. That‚Äôs it.

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup ‚Äî Monday.com
1. Go to **https://monday.com** ‚Üí profile menu ‚Üí **Admin / Developers** ‚Üí **API** and **generate a personal API token** (or use an existing token with the correct permissions).  
2. In n8n, create a new **Monday.com** credential and paste your **API token**.  
3. Identify your **Board ID** and **Group ID**:
   - Open your board in a browser; the URL often contains the board ID.  
   - Group IDs can be read via the Monday.com node (e.g., ‚ÄúList‚Äù operations) or from the UI if available.  
4. Confirm column IDs on your board. Common examples used by this template (you can map to your own):  
   - `text_mkvdj8v3` ‚Üí Email (Text)  
   - `date_mkvdg4aa` ‚Üí Start Date (Date)  
   - `dropdown_mkvdjwra` ‚Üí Engagement Type (Dropdown)  
   - `dropdown_mkvdd9v3` ‚Üí Campaign Type (Dropdown)  
   - `text_mkvd2md9` ‚Üí Campaign Type (Label as Text)  
   - `text_mkvd1bj2` ‚Üí Instructions (Text)  
   - `text_mkvd5w3y` ‚Üí Domain (Text)  
5. Update the **label‚ÜíID mappings** in the Monday.com node if your dropdown IDs differ:  
   - Example mapping in the JSON:  
     - `Engagement A` ‚Üí `1`, `Engagement B` ‚Üí `2`  
     - `Campaign A` ‚Üí `1`, `Campaign B` ‚Üí `2`  
   Replace these with the actual IDs from your board‚Äôs dropdown columns.

user.name: Robert Breen
user.bio: Professional services consultant with over 10 years of experience solving complex business problems across industries. I specialize in n8n and process automation‚Äîdesigning custom workflows that integrate tools like Google Calendar, Airtable, GPT, and internal systems. Whether you need to automate scheduling, sync data, or streamline operations, I build solutions that save time and drive results.
